title: Flovvres of Sion. By VVilliam Drummond of Hawthorne-denne. To which is adioyned his cypresse groue
author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.
publisher: Printed [by the heirs of Andro Hart],
notes: "A cypresse groue" has separate divisional title; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
